meanings.definition: To engage in a competition or contest against someone.
meanings.sent1: She enjoys versing her friends in friendly games.
meanings.sent2: The two teams will be versing each other in the final match.
meanings.sent3: The siblings were versing each other in a game of chess, trying to outsmart one another.
meanings.sent4: The young athlete was versing his own fears as he prepared for the race.
meanings.sent5: The students were versing for the top spot in the spelling bee, each determined to win.
